description: Anandho Brahma is a Yoga Program started by Yoga Guruji Shri. Chalmaraju Miryala garu. He has started practicing yoga around 20 years back under the guidance of Shri. Manthena Satyanarayana Raju.

Before starting yoga, he was suffering from multiple problems and he visitied many places for the solution for those problems. Then he got to know about the Yoga classes which are held my Manthena garu in his location.

He listened to Dr. Mantena Satyanarayana speeches and inspired with the yoga concept and he bought some of Mantena gari books and started reading them and practicing. Within few days after started practicing yoga, he found solutions for his own health problems and within one year time his problems were completely caured.

Then he got an idea to teach yoga to people who are suffering from many problems which are not get sured by the Multispeciality doctors. He started an organization called 'Anandho Brahma' and started teaching yoga. He has started the classes with 2 people in the beginning and now in his own city everyday 100 people are getting trained in yoga in 5 different batches everyday.

He also goes to different schools and colleges and teach yoga and inspire them with some personality development classes. He also visits different places to give the guest lectures on yoga in your life concept.

This mobile application is a very small step in to attract the many social media people because in present day situation people are mostly living in social media only. So we thought this will be perfect platform to attract the people and teach them yoga and cure their problems.

This application currently includes Surya Namaskar, Asanas, Pranayama and meditation explained in a simple way with the detailed instructions. Please share the application with your friends and share them helthy life as a gift.
